group_1.textCenter: Everyone you called for is here.

group_1.textLeft: We're finally going to war with Torayamachi, huh~?

group_1.textRight: Jeez...
Since you called us out like this, you must have a @strat or two in mind, right?

group_1.textLeft: That's what I wanted you guys here for.

group_1.textRight: But you're more familiar with Yuna Kureha than @anyone else here...
Which means you should be able to come up with @the best strat against her, right?

group_1.textLeft: Actually, I came up with a plan myself, and wanted @to hear what you think of it.

group_1.textRight: Hmm? Okay. Let's hear it, then.
You needed me here too~?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, 'cause you're smart, right?

group_1.textRight: Tehe~

group_1.textLeft: Will you just listen already?
First off, if I was Yuna right now,
I'd be out on the front lines givin' my @orders personally.
She'll usually form six three-person units.
Plus, she loves using cheap tricks like luring the @enemy in with rocks charged with magic power.

group_1.textRight: Cheap tricks? @Sounds like a solid strat to me.

group_1.textLeft: Juri the Great won't stand for that kinda thing!

group_1.textRight: I know you won't.
Still, teams of three do sound nice and flexible.
Don't they~?

group_1.textLeft: Well, @I'm goin' with two teams of nine!

group_1.textRight: [chara:304400:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Seriously?! @What are you, a fucking moron?

group_1.textLeft: The hell did you say?!
You got a problem with Juri the Great's plan?!

group_1.textRight: Hey,[chara:102400:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:102400:cheek_0][chara:102400:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json:motion_400][chara:102400:lipSynch_1] you're the one who said @you wanted to hear what we think!

group_1.textLeft: I mean, yeah, but[chara:102400:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:102400:cheek_0][chara:102400:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json:motion_400][chara:102400:lipSynch_1] why'd you call me a moron?!

group_1.textRight: Just imagine us crossing over the central bridge @in such a large group.
We'd be sitting ducks and end up surrounded in no time.
I agree. It's too risky to try breaking through their @front lines in big teams like that~

group_1.textLeft: You think so too, huh, Ao...

group_1.textRight: Of course I do~
Keeping everyone clustered together means they @won't be able to maneuver around easily,
which means they can't really go all out, either.
We'd fall right into the enemy's traps, and it'd be a bloodbath of a Game Over~
But...

group_1.textLeft: What? You got somethin' better in mind?

group_1.textRight: If you and Yuna are so familiar with each other, @then she knows how you'll act too, right?
In that case, we should probably avoid Monzenbashi altogether.
Instead, we should go for the other bridges. East and West Oogibashi.
Nine people to attack each bridge. @What do you think~?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102400:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Oh?!
You really think we can take Torayamachi by @surprise like that?

group_1.textRight: I can't say for sure, since both sides are playing mind games right now~

group_1.textLeft: If Torayamachi is really expectin' us to come @through Monzenbashi,
then we can crush them with a pincer attack from @the other two bridges.
Even if they place one unit on each of the bridges,
it'll be nine against three.
We'd outnumber them and stamp 'em out on @the east and west bridges.

group_1.textRight: ...Well, that's not too bad, I guess?

group_1.textLeft: Alright then, this is our official plan!
Hey, ya bastards!

group_1.textRight: Y-yes!

group_1.textLeft: You heard everything we went over just now, @right?

group_1.textRight: Of course!

group_1.textLeft: Alright, then pass it on to the others, will ya?
If you mess up on even one detail, I'll burn you @to a crisp. Got it?

group_1.textRight: U-understood!
Actually, I've got an idea too.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm?

group_1.textRight: I think we should hold off for a while before @attacking.

group_1.textLeft: Do you have any damn idea how long I've waited for this? And you want me to wait even LONGER?

group_1.textRight: I'll support her idea~

group_1.textLeft: You agree with her again, huh, Ao...

group_1.textRight: We leave them tightly wound and waiting for the @first attack, and eventually they'll burn out...
That's your plan, right~?
You catch on quick.

group_1.textLeft: I can't stand Game Overs, so I need to look at things from every angle~

group_1.textRight: That makes two of us.

group_1.textCenter: Man, you two are like peas in a pod.
Juri the Great feels kinda left out...
Eh, whatever. You guys do whatever you want.
All I'm after is a one-on-one showdown @with Yuna.
